page.title: 07EMPLOYMENT IN CALLANDER
page.content: This region contains the main shopping area;food,souvenier shops,banks,lawyer office,doctors'and dentists'surgeries. Most shops are privately owned.Many people work part-time in the shops, hotels,guesthouses,bars,restuarants, which are very busy in summer. The schools employ teachers,dinner ladies,and secretaries. There is a Police Station,sub P.O., health clinic and library,Council Depot and sewage works.Next door is the Industrial Estate. There are many{small firms}-joiners, builders,plumbers,electricians,printer ,welders,car repair workshops,pottery a nursery and bakeries. There are some farms outside Callander.There is very little {unemployment}but people have to travel out of Callander to work.
